title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 2 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 2 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing?
lineList.cn: 外邦为什么争闹，万民为什么谋算虚妄的事。

lineList.en: The kings of the earth set themselves, and the rulers take counsel together, against the LORD, and against his anointed, saying,
lineList.cn: 世上的君王一齐起来，臣宰一同商议，要敌挡耶和华，并他的受膏者，

lineList.en: Let us break their bands asunder, and cast away their cords from us.
lineList.cn: 说，我们要挣开他们的捆绑，脱去他们的绳索。

lineList.en: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the LORD shall have them in derision.
lineList.cn: 那坐在天上的必发笑。主必嗤笑他们。

lineList.en: Then shall he speak unto them in his wrath, and vex them in his sore displeasure.
lineList.cn: 那时他要在怒中责备他们，在烈怒中惊吓他们，

lineList.en: Yet have I set my king upon my holy hill of Zion.
lineList.cn: 说，我已立我的君在锡安我的圣山了。

lineList.en: I will declare the decree: the LORD hath said unto me, Thou art my Son; this day have I begotten thee.
lineList.cn: 受膏者说，我要传圣旨。耶和华曾对我说，你是我的儿子，我今日生你。

lineList.en: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession.
lineList.cn: 你求我，我就将列国赐你为基业，将地极赐你为田产。

lineList.en: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel.
lineList.cn: 你必用铁杖打破他们。你必将他们如同窑匠的瓦器摔碎。

lineList.en: Be wise now therefore, O ye kings: be instructed, ye judges of the earth.
lineList.cn: 现在你们君王应当醒悟。你们世上的审判官该受管教。

lineList.en: Serve the LORD with fear, and rejoice with trembling.
lineList.cn: 当存畏惧事奉耶和华，又当存战兢而快乐。

lineList.en: Kiss the Son, lest he be angry, and ye perish from the way, when his wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.
lineList.cn: 当以嘴亲子，恐怕他发怒，你们便在道中灭亡，因为他的怒气快要发作。凡投靠他的，都是有福的。
